snippet.title: Man stomps Perth postal worker
snippet.content: A man is being questioned over an attack on a 71-year-old Perth postal worker who was knocked off her motorbike and repeatedly kicked as she lay on the ground. Police say she was delivering mail on Templeman Place in Midland about 1.30pm on Thursday when a man attacked her. The woman suffered minor injuries and was discharged from St John of God Midland Hospital on Thursday. Originally published as
